title: What if Hitler, FDR, Mussolini, Donald Trump and George Washington were all trapped in a room together? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Hitler would team up with Mussolini and kill George Washington, probably the greatest threat. Then he’d kill FDR because A) he has polio and is therefore inferior and B) because he attacked Germany in WWII. Then, he’d wonder what to make of Trump, and any of three scenarios could occur depending on how old D.T. is. If Trump is young, in his twenties or thirties, then he’d probably kidnap him and get a ransom for his father’s and his money.If Trump is older, forties to sixties, then Hitler would kill him and steal his money, then find and murder his family.If Trump is running for president, then Hitler would kill him and watch the nation crumble under Hillary Clinton.If Trump is President Trump, then Hitler would kill Mussolini and try to be friends, then President Trump would say, “Nope,” then call for the Navy SEALs, only to realize he doesn’t have a communication device. Trump would probably offer Hitler a bunch of money and a safe place to go, then Hitler would accept and leave, only to realize he can’t. Trump then realizes he is 7 inches taller than Hitler and weighs 80 pounds more, so he decides to get up, stretch, then starts wrestling with Hitler. Hitler was fairly well-trained as a Nazi, and strong for his size, but could not overcome the physical prowess of the American President. Trump gets Hitler into a choke-hold and says, as Hitler’s brain loses its oxygen, “You live in a s—hole country.” And there goes Hitler.

What if- The world was really flat? What if- pigs could really fly? What if – Michelle Obama was really a guy? What if- Obama was really an American citizen? What if- this wasn’t a stupid ass question? What if?
